<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_ux_page_property"><sys_ux_page_property action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choices/><description>Header Configuration</description><name>chrome_header</name><page display_value="{Program Name} DHS Service Desk">72742a12298b429003ded1b08122f5fb</page><required_translations>[ {

    "privatePage": {
        "notificationsEnabled": true,
        "searchEnabled": true,
        "userPrefsEnabled": true,
        "contextualConfigurationItems": {
            "_roles": [
                "workspace_admin"
            ],
            "enabled": true,
            "position": 150
        },
        "globalTools": {
            "collapsingMenuId": 0,
            "primaryItems": [{
                "label": "UserMenu",
                "icon": "user",
                "type": "menu",
                "primaryDisplay": "icon",
                "value": {
                    "children": [{
                            "_roles": [
                                "workspace_admin"
                            ],
                            "label": {
                                "message": "Configure workspace",
                                "translatable": true
                            },
                            "type": "navigation",
                            "position": 100,
                            "primaryDisplay": "none",
                            "value": {
                                "type": "external",
                                "opensWindow": "true",
                                "value": {
                                    "href": "/nav_to.do?uri=/sys_ux_app_config.do?sys_id=36742a12a88b42901888db308f4152fb"
                                }
                            }
                        },
                        {
                            "label": {
                                "message": "Settings",
                                "translatable": true
                            },
                            "type": "menu",
                            "position": 50,
                            "value": {
                                "children": [{
                                        "label": {
                                            "message": "Display Preferences",
                                            "translatable": true
                                        },
                                        "type": "divider"
                                    },
                                    {
                                        "label": {
                                            "message": "Show ribbon",
                                            "translatable": true
                                        },
                                        "type": "toggle",
                                        "value": {
                                            "_meta": {
                                                "_type": "userPreferences",
                                                "_path": "userPrefName",
                                                "_value": {
                                                    "userPrefName": "workspace.showRibbon"
                                                },
                                                "_default": {
                                                    "userPrefName": "true"
                                                }
                                            }
                                        }
                                    },
                                    {
                                        "label": {
                                            "message": "Show sidebar",
                                            "translatable": true
                                        },
                                        "type": "toggle",
                                        "value": {
                                            "_meta": {
                                                "_type": "userPreferences",
                                                "_path": "userPrefName",
                                                "_value": {
                                                    "userPrefName": "workspace.showAgentAssist"
                                                },
                                                "_default": {
                                                    "userPrefName": "true"
                                                }
                                            }
                                        }
                                    },
                                    {
                                        "label": {
                                            "message": "Wrap list text",
                                            "translatable": true
                                        },
                                        "type": "toggle",
                                        "value": {
                                            "_meta": {
                                                "_type": "userPreferences",
                                                "_path": "userPrefName",
                                                "_value": {
                                                    "userPrefName": "workspace.wrapListText"
                                                },
                                                "_default": {
                                                    "userPrefName": "true"
                                                }
                                            }
                                        }
                                    },
                                    {
                                        "label": {
                                            "message": "Notifications",
                                            "translatable": true
                                        },
                                        "type": "divider"
                                    },
                                    {
                                        "label": {
                                            "message": "Show Banners",
                                            "translatable": true
                                        },
                                        "type": "toggle",
                                        "value": {
                                            "_meta": {
                                                "_type": "userPreferences",
                                                "_path": "userPrefName",
                                                "_value": {
                                                    "userPrefName": "workspace.notifications.showPopups"
                                                },
                                                "_default": {
                                                    "userPrefName": "true"
                                                }
                                            }
                                        }
                                    },
                                    {
                                        "label": {
                                            "message": "Show Badge Count",
                                            "translatable": true
                                        },
                                        "type": "toggle",
                                        "value": {
                                            "_meta": {
                                                "_type": "userPreferences",
                                                "_path": "userPrefName",
                                                "_value": {
                                                    "userPrefName": "workspace.notifications.showBadgeCount"
                                                },
                                                "_default": {
                                                    "userPrefName": "true"
                                                }
                                            }
                                        }
                                    }
                                ]
                            }
                        }
                    ]
                }
            }],
            "secondaryItems": [

            ]
        }
    },
    "publicPage": {
        "actionButtons": [

        ]
    }
}</value></sys_ux_page_property><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=32742a123c8b429007e3d3efcc2cc4ea"/></record_update>
